channel.title: FAQ's – Infinite Incarnations
channel.description: Choose your world... and bring your character to life!

item.title: What sets Incarna apart from other RPGs?
item.dc:creator: templeorder
item.content:encoded: An example of a brief encounter resolution which demonstrates the level of immersive story telling and interaction the Incarna system engenders. It demonstrates the depth of description the GM should aim for, the danger and grittiness and roleplaying challenge framework. challenging
